title: Trying to reconnect
body:
HELP !!!! I am MAC user and just updated open beta client couple of days ago, today i played few games in the morning but now i can't log in. it shown " trying to reconnect", been trying few methods but still can't log in
anyone ????????????

replies.body:
I just started getting this too. Anyone else?

I'll ask someone to check it out.

EDIT: Can you tell me what ISP you're with?

UPDATE 22:16 - I'm still getting the error, but as far as we can tell the amount of affected players is extremely small (we unlucky few). There are very slight changes to connection quality for TPG players, so it might just be a slight ISP issue that we have to wait out at this point :(
(I'm getting similar wonky issues trying to patch Overwatch, it's working but cutting out every now and then)

UPDATE 01:07 - More reports are starting to come in from other servers, but numbers still appear low relative to total playerbase.

FINAL UPDATE - The issue was resolved early Saturday morning.

**WORKAROUND**: While we work to figure out what is causing this, you can avoid the issue by logging in to Legacy client, as its older feature set does not check for updates as often so won't constantly lose connection once you're able to log in.
I'm with TPG as well, I have also been getting the connection error, been trying since the same time (4~ hours ago) to no success :(

Try switching to Legacy client for now. If you can log in while the connection is working you should stay connected after that. Basically the new client looks for patches very frequently and seems to be failing its connection to the patcher servers for some players.
Yeah I have the same issue ("trying to reconnect") and I'm with TPG as well. I can also confirm that the legacy client is not working for me either.
It's the morning after, I tried logging in again and it works now.

Legacy client not working either, instead I receive an 'unspecified error occurred. Please check the logs for more information' message and cannot press any other buttons on the client (eg. settings, minimise). Is the best option just to wait until this issue with TPG is sorted?

At this point it might not be an issue strictly with TPG, though we can't yet determine why only a small subset of players (primarily on one ISP) is being affected. Routing to our patcher servers is still a likely possibility and ISP's play a part in that, though where the problem lies we can't yet be certain.
is there any other way to fix it ?
I am also getting the problem launch league and it says trying to reconnect sometimes i get in and it just says it on the home page. Im with TPG. pls i just wanna play ziggs ;_;
I'm getting the same issue, same ISP. Thanks for the info.

I am also with TPG and haven't been able to log in at all. I decided to try opening up league using my iPhone's 4G without messing with any repairs or anything and that worked perfectly. So maybe it is just a problem with TPG atm?
I'd like to add in to say that I'm getting the same thing. Using a local ISP too. On a PC. Hope that bit of info helps. It also won't allow me to try and enter the legacy client either. Hope

Do you know who your ISP is?

From what we can see the server seems healthy but I'm still experiencing this issue so it might be limited to a few players on a certain connection.
Bendigo Community Telco. Internet here is also pretty stable too. Able to get in early today but yeah seems to not want to get in at all
For anyone still experiencing this issue can you please run the following https://t1.re/?riotgamespatcher-a.akamaihd.net and paste your results? Thank you.

I just full initially repaired mine, and it worked, 15mins later and i can actually log in and que for a game. Also try resetting your IP in cmd.exe, google how to do it lols

Good Luck!

-70s
lol what?
This is my experience: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=YjoQreTDYKc
same but i cant even log in >.<
Ditto.  On a PC, with beta, in Melbourne.  Finally lets me login, only to start "trying to reconnect" as soon as I'm in
Same issue, TPG near Melbourne.

i have the same issue, about trying to reconnect my only option is EXIT THE GAME,
is there a fix to this yet ?

I tried repairing, it doesn't work either, 

HALP
I'm getting the same problem with TPG from Adelaide
